name: Mine !
description:
Mine is a party game ( only playable from 2 - 4 players for now with Gamepads. Supports PS and XBox controllers but will only show Xbox prompts ) being developed by a solo programmer using Unity.

Each character ( up to 5 for now ) has its own ability to control the platforms.

More maps are coming, more characters are coming, more spells are coming.

Note that this game is in it's really early stages ! I'm making it playable so you can give me your thoughts !

Follow my Devlog for more info :)
